metadata.description: What happens when the most evil and powerful female characters in the Grimm Universe join forces? You'll find out in this new miniseries that brings together an all star cast of girls that were born to be bad. The Mistress of Limbo has gathered together a team of allies from across the four realms of power. Will anyone be able to stand against the united power of Baba Yaga, the Goblin Queen and the Queen of spades? Don't miss the baddest series in the history of Grimm Fairy Tales.
metadata.name: Bad Girls
